name: MEGA ACTION NUCLEAR TRUCK
description:
This is my entry for the Weekly Game Jam #90!
The theme was Radioactivity.

There is no win or lose condition at the moment!

You are a truck driver transporting nuclear material. Watch out for oncoming traffic or your truck will take damage and eventually explode!

CONTROLS
WASD or arrow keys to control the truck
ESC to pause/unpause
